abstract: The P1 Pico Projector from AAXA Technologies offers one gigabyte of memory, a microSD slot and an onboard media player.
snippet: The P1 Pico Projector from AAXA Technologies offers one gigabyte of memory, a microSD slot and an onboard media player.
lead_paragraph: Miniprojectors are a dime a dozen these days, which is why most don’t stand out from the pack. Fortunately the same can’t be said about AAXA Technologies P1 Pico Projector.

headline.main: Pocket Projector Stands Out, Even in a Small Crowd
headline.print_headline: Pocket Projector Stands Out, Even in a Small Crowd
